tool_description: This API provides a flyer and brochure printing services for developers. It enables you to price and order commercially printed flyers and brochures with different folds, colors, paper, coating and with or without hold punches from within your web and mobile applications.
name: Flyer Printing
title: Flyer Printing

api_list.name: Get Proof
api_list.description:
The pulls a proof for a print file that has been posted.

URL: https://developer.mimeo.com/api/flyer/proof/{proof id}

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: Your API User ID

required_parameters.name: userkey
required_parameters.description: Your API User Key

api_list.name: Get Order Quote
api_list.description:
This method gets a full order quote for a flyer or brochure print order.

URL: https://developer.mimeo.com/api/flyer/orderquote/

required_parameters.name: apartmentorsuite
required_parameters.description: Apartment or suite where flyer or brochure will be delivered.

required_parameters.name: backpdfurl
required_parameters.description: The URL of the PDF to be back of flyer or brochure.

required_parameters.name: careof
required_parameters.description: Alternate name for person to take care of flyer or brochure when delivered.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: City where flyer or brochure will be delivered.

required_parameters.name: coating
required_parameters.description: None, Lamination or Glossy

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: Color, Black & White

required_parameters.name: companyname
required_parameters.description: The name of company where flyer or brochure will be delivered.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: Email address of flyer or brochure recipient.

required_parameters.name: firstname
required_parameters.description: First name of person who flyer or brochure will be delivered to.

required_parameters.name: fold
required_parameters.description: No Fold, 2 Panel Half Fold, 3 Panel Letter Folder, 3 Panel Z Fold

required_parameters.name: frontpdfurl
required_parameters.description: The URL of the PDF to be front of flyer or brochure.

required_parameters.name: fullname
required_parameters.description: Full name of person who flyer or brochure will be delivered to.

required_parameters.name: holepunch
required_parameters.description: None or Hole Punch

required_parameters.name: isresidential
required_parameters.description: If flyer or brochure will be delivered to a residence (True or False)

required_parameters.name: lastname
required_parameters.description: Last name of person who flyer or brochure will be delivered to.

required_parameters.name: layout
required_parameters.description: Portrait or Landscape *Lanscape coming soon, not available currently

required_parameters.name: paper
required_parameters.description: White Paper (24 lb Bright), White Paper (28 lb Premium), White Paper (28 lb Premium Recycled), White Card Stock (100 lb Regular), White Card Stock (80 lb Regular 100% Recycled), White Card Stock (100 lb Glossy)

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: Phone number of flyer or brochure recipient.

required_parameters.name: postalcode
required_parameters.description: Postal code where flyer or brochure will be delivered.

required_parameters.name: quantity
required_parameters.description: Quantity of flyer or brochures to be printed.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State where flyer or brochure will be delivered.

required_parameters.name: streetaddress
required_parameters.description: Street address where flyer or brochure will be delivered.

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: Your API User ID

required_parameters.name: userkey
required_parameters.description: Your API User Key

api_list.description:
This method returns shipping / delivery options for a flyer or brochure print order.

api_list.name: Get Order Status
api_list.description:
The method returns the submitted date and status of a print order.

URL: https://developer.mimeo.com/api/flyer/orderstatus/

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: A returned order id for an active order.

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: Your API User ID

required_parameters.name: userkey
required_parameters.description: Your API User Key

api_list.name: Get Quote
api_list.description:
This method pulls a quote for an single product. Returns current price for just printing of the product. Does not include shipping costs.

URL: https://developer.mimeo.com/api/flyer/quote/

required_parameters.name: fold
required_parameters.description: No Fold, 2 Panel Half Fold, 3 Panel Letter Folder, 3 Panel Z Fold

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: Color, Black & White

required_parameters.name: backpdfurl
required_parameters.description: The URL of the PDF to be back of flyer or brochure.

required_parameters.name: coating
required_parameters.description: None, Lamination or Glossy

required_parameters.name: frontpdfurl
required_parameters.description: The URL of the PDF to be front of flyer or brochure.

required_parameters.name: holepunch
required_parameters.description: None or Hole Punch

required_parameters.name: layout
required_parameters.description: Portrait or Landscape *Lanscape coming soon, not available currently

required_parameters.name: paper
required_parameters.description: White Paper (24 lb Bright), White Paper (28 lb Premium), White Paper (28 lb Premium Recycled), White Card Stock (100 lb Regular), White Card Stock (80 lb Regular 100% Recycled), White Card Stock (100 lb Glossy)

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: Your API User ID

required_parameters.name: userkey
required_parameters.description: Your API User Key
